thread.title: 3 arrested in Portland, Ore., in Marin trail killing
thread.title_full: 3 arrested in Portland, Ore., in Marin trail killing - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kale Williams
title: 3 arrested in Portland, Ore., in Marin trail killing
text:
Photo: Marin Sheriff's Dept. Three suspects, identified by the Marin County Sheriff's Office as Morrison Haze Lampley, 23, left, Sean Michael Angold, 24, center, Lila Scott Allgood, 18, right, were arrested Wednesday in Oregon on suspicion of murdering a Tantric massage therapist on a Marin County hiking trail. Three suspects, identified by the Marin County Sheriff's Office as...
Three suspects were arrested Wednesday in Oregon on suspicion of murdering a Tantric massage therapist on a Marin County hiking trail, after the stolen car they were driving was tracked using GPS technology, county sheriff’s investigators said. Three suspects, identified by the Marin County Sheriff's Office as Morrison Haze Lampley, 23, left, Sean Michael Angold, 24, center, Lila Scott Allgood, 18, right, were arrested Wednesday in Oregon on suspicion of murdering a Tantric massage therapist on a Marin County hiking trail. Three suspects, identified by the Marin County Sheriff's Office as...
Three suspects were arrested Wednesday in Oregon on suspicion of murdering a Tantric massage therapist on a Marin County hiking trail, after the stolen car they were driving was tracked using GPS technology, county sheriff’s investigators said.
